attributes.action: MP's stripped of title, reimburse money to public, when found to act dishonestly
attributes.additional_details:
MP's have calloborated with enemy states in order to gain financially for themselves without public awareness, especially after sending our soldiers to war. 
MP's have used tax money to make their life more comfortable and enhance their lifestyle without going through open and correct procedures.
MP's have spent tax money on excessive and unnecessary travel expenses.
MP's have taken money from peers to enhance their own position in government.
attributes.background: MP's (including the Prime Minister) to be stripped of title (EG. knights of the garter, OBE) when found to be acting dishonestly or illegally in their working capacity and not in the public interests. All money used for personal benefit should be reimbursed to the public purse.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petition calling for similar actions:

Require any MP or Peer convicted of a criminal offence be removed from office
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600515

Make Lying In Public Office A Specific Criminal Offence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593074

Make the Ministerial Code and Nolan Principles legally enforceable for MPs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593204

Ban MPs from paid lobbying
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600685
